title: Spirit Tree Patch

properties.name: description
properties.value: Spirit Tree patches are the Farming patches where players can grow their own Spirit tree from a spirit sapling, created with a spirit seed. Spirit seeds are a rare and untradable drop.

content:
Spirit Tree patches are the Farming patches where players can grow their own Spirit tree from a spirit sapling, created with a spirit seed. Spirit seeds are a rare and untradable drop.

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99. The Spirit tree in a Superior garden in the player-owned house does not count towards this limit. The required Farming level can be boosted.

Spirit trees grow in about 58 hours and 40 minutes. Growing a spirit tree yields 19,501.3 Farming experience, which is the sum of planting (199.5 experience) and checking its health (19,301.8 experience). They cannot be cut down, but may be cleared with a spade.

Spirit trees can catch diseases while growing, like many other plants. The nearby gnome gardener can be paid to prevent this, for a payment of 5 monkey nuts, 1 monkey bar, and 1 ground suqah tooth. Given the rarity of the seed, the experience given, and the length of time it takes to mature, having a gardener tend the growing plant is strongly recommended.

Spirit tree patches[edit | edit source]

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

South-east Etceteria
Gardener: Yulf Squecks
  • Advisor Ghrim (Managing Miscellania)
  • Sea snakes
  • Bush patch
  • Ship to Rellekka
  • Ring of wealth to Miscellania
  • Fairy ring code cip
  • Enchanted lyre/Fremennik sea boots teleport, then run north to the boat
  • Rellekka house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab, then run north to the boat
East of Port Sarim
Gardener: Frizzy Skernip
  • Ship to Void Knights' Outpost
  • Ship to Entrana
    • Law Altar at Entrana
  • Ship to Great Kourend
  • Charter ship
  • Port Sarim and Rimmington shops
  • Draynor Village farming patches
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Rimmington house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
North of Brimhaven
Gardener: Praistan Ebola
  • Fruit tree patch
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Calquat tree patch
  • Charter ship (Port Sarim spot is slightly better)
  • Brimhaven house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Karamja gloves 3/4 to Shilo Village, then take the cart
  • Teleport to Ardougne and take a boat ride to Brimhaven
South-west of Hosidius
Gardener: Lammy Langle
  • Watson
  • Tithe Farm minigame
  • Allotment and flower/Herb patches
  • Charcoal furnace
  • Saltpetre
  • Sand Crabs
  • Mess
  • Forthos Dungeon
  • Skills necklace to Woodcutting Guild
  • Hosidius portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Xeric's talisman to Xeric's Glade
  • Tithe Farm Grouping teleport
Northern section of the Farming Guild
(85 Farming required)
Gardener: Latlink Fastbell
  • Farming Guild patches
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west
rawContent:
'''Spirit Tree patches''' are the [[Farming patch]]es where players can grow their own [[Spirit tree]] from a [[spirit sapling]], created with a [[spirit seed]]. Spirit seeds are a rare and untradable drop.

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 [[Farming]], two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99. The [[Spirit tree (Construction)|Spirit tree]] in a [[Superior garden]] in the [[player-owned house]] '''does not''' count towards this limit. The required Farming level can be [[Farming#Temporary boosts|boosted]].

Spirit trees grow in about 58 hours and 40 minutes. Growing a spirit tree yields 19,501.3 Farming [[experience]], which is the sum of planting (199.5 experience) and checking its health (19,301.8 experience). They cannot be cut down, but may be cleared with a [[spade]].

Spirit trees can catch [[Disease (farming)|diseases]] while growing, like many other plants. The nearby [[Group of Advanced Gardeners|gnome gardener]] can be paid to prevent this, for a payment of 5 [[monkey nuts]], 1 [[monkey bar]], and 1 [[ground suqah tooth]]. Given the rarity of the seed, the [[experience]] given, and the length of time it takes to mature, having a gardener tend the growing plant is strongly recommended.
